item.title: About Me
item.description: This site is essentially the result of those weird questions I find myself wondering about and the train of thought I followed. Since my curiosity tends to pull me in all directions, I thought I could write about them here and if I happen to not pursue that thought, somebody else will. Most of the posts are completed using a combination of open source tools and scripts I write myself. The topic may range from anything related to Machine Learning, Robotics to Data Analysis.
